verses.verse: A false <WH4820> balance <WH3976> is abomination <WH8441> to the YY <WH3068>: but a just <WH8003> weight <WH68> is his delight <WH7522>.
When pride <WH2087> cometh <WH935> <WH8804>, then cometh <WH935> <WH8799> shame <WH7036>: but with the lowly <WH6800> <WH8803> is wisdom <WH2451>.

The integrity <WH8538> of the upright <WH3477> shall guide <WH5148> <WH8686> them: but the perverseness <WH5558> of transgressors <WH898> <WH8802> shall destroy <WH7703> <WH8799> <WH8675> <WH7703> <WH8804> them.
Riches <WH1952> profit <WH3276> <WH8686> not in the day <WH3117> of wrath <WH5678>: but righteousness <WH6666> delivereth <WH5337> <WH8686> from death <WH4194>.
The righteousness <WH6666> of the perfect <WH8549> shall direct <WH3474> <WH8762> his way <WH1870>: but the wicked <WH7563> shall fall <WH5307> <WH8799> by his own wickedness <WH7564>.
The righteousness <WH6666> of the upright <WH3477> shall deliver <WH5337> <WH8686> them: but transgressors <WH898> <WH8802> shall be taken <WH3920> <WH8735> in their own naughtiness <WH1942>.
When a wicked <WH7563> man <WH120> dieth <WH4194>, his expectation <WH8615> shall perish <WH6> <WH8799>: and the hope <WH8431> of unjust <WH205> men perisheth <WH6> <WH8804>.
The righteous <WH6662> is delivered out <WH2502> <WH8738> of trouble <WH6869>, and the wicked <WH7563> cometh <WH935> <WH8799> in his stead.
An hypocrite <WH2611> with his mouth <WH6310> destroyeth <WH7843> <WH8686> his neighbour <WH7453>: but through knowledge <WH1847> shall the just <WH6662> be delivered <WH2502> <WH8735>.
When it goeth well <WH2898> with the righteous <WH6662>, the city <WH7151> rejoiceth <WH5970> <WH8799>: and when the wicked <WH7563> perish <WH6> <WH8800>, there is shouting <WH7440>.
By the b'rakhah <WH1293> of the upright <WH3477> the city <WH7176> is exalted <WH7311> <WH8799>: but it is overthrown <WH2040> <WH8735> by the mouth <WH6310> of the wicked <WH7563>.
He that is void <WH2638> of wisdom <WH3820> despiseht <WH936> <WH8802> his neighbour <WH7453>: but a man <WH376> of understanding <WH8394> holdeth his peace <WH2790> <WH8686>.
A talebearer <WH1980> <WH8802> <WH7400> revealeth <WH1540> <WH8764> secrets <WH5475>: but he that is of a faithful <WH539> <WH8738> spirit <WH7307> concealeth <WH3680> <WH8764> the matter <WH1697>.
Where no counsel <WH8458> is, the people <WH5971> fall <WH5307> <WH8799>: but in the multitude <WH7230> of counsellors <WH3289> <WH8802> there is safety <WH8668>.

He that is surety <WH6148> <WH8804> for a stranger <WH2114> <WH8801> shall smart <WH7321> <WH8735> <WH7451> for it: and he that hateth <WH8130> <WH8802> suretiship <WH8628> <WH8802> is sure <WH982> <WH8802>.
A gracious <WH2580> woman <WH802> retaineth <WH8551> <WH8799> honour <WH3519>: and strong <WH6184> men retain <WH8551> <WH8799> riches <WH6239>.
The merciful <WH2617> man <WH376> doeth good <WH1580> <WH8802> to his own soul <WH5315>: but he that is cruel <WH394> troubleth <WH5916> <WH8802> his own flesh <WH7607>.
The wicked <WH7563> worketh <WH6213> <WH8802> a deceitful <WH8267> work <WH6468>: but to him that soweth <WH2232> <WH8802> righteousness <WH6666> shall be a sure <WH571> reward <WH7938>.
As righteousness <WH6666> tendeth to life <WH2416>: so he that pursueth <WH7291> <WH8764> evil <WH7451> pursueth it to his own death <WH4194>.
They that are of a froward <WH6141> heart <WH3820> are abomination <WH8441> to the YY <WH3068>: but such as are upright <WH8549> in their way <WH1870> are his delight <WH7522>.
Though hand <WH3027> join in hand <WH3027>, the wicked <WH7451> shall not be unpunished <WH5352> <WH8735>: but the seed <WH2233> of the righteous <WH6662> shall be delivered <WH4422> <WH8738>.
As a jewel <WH5141> of gold <WH2091> in a swine's <WH2386> snout <WH639>, so is a fair <WH3303> woman <WH802> which is without <WH5493> <WH8802> discretion <WH2940>.
The desire <WH8378> of the righteous <WH6662> is only good <WH2896>: but the expectation <WH8615> of the wicked <WH7563> is wrath <WH5678>.

There is <WH3426> that scattereth <WH6340> <WH8764>, and yet increaseht <WH3254> <WH8737>; and there is that withholdeth <WH2820> <WH8802> more than is meet <WH3476>, but it tendeth to poverty <WH4270>.
The liberal <WH1293> soul <WH5315> shall be made fat <WH1878> <WH8792>: and he that watereth <WH7301> <WH8688> shall be watered <WH3384> <WH8686> also himself.

He that withholdeth <WH4513> <WH8802> corn <WH1250>, the people <WH3816> shall curse <WH5344> <WH8799> him: but b'rakhah <WH1293> shall be upon the head <WH7218> of him that selleth <WH7666> <WH8688> it.

He that diligently seeketh <WH7836> <WH8802> good <WH2896> procureth <WH1245> <WH8762> favour <WH7522>: but he that seeketh <WH1875> <WH8802> mischief <WH7451>, it shall come <WH935> <WH8799> unto him.
He that trusteth <WH982> <WH8802> in his riches <WH6239> shall fall <WH5307> <WH8799>: but the righteous <WH6662> shall flourish <WH6524> <WH8799> as a branch <WH5929>.
He that troubleth <WH5916> <WH8802> his own house <WH1004> shall inherit <WH5157> <WH8799> the wind <WH7307>: and the fool <WH191> shall be servant <WH5650> to the wise <WH2450> of heart <WH3820>.
The fruit <WH6529> of the righteous <WH6662> is a tree <WH6086> of life <WH2416>; and he that winneth <WH3947> <WH8802> souls <WH5315> is wise <WH2450>.
Behold, the righteous <WH6662> shall be recompensed <WH7999> <WH8792> in the earth <WH776>: much more the wicked <WH7563> and the sinner <WH2398> <WH8802>.
